abstract: BlackArrow, a maker of advertising technology designed to target on-demand audiences, has landed $20 million in a third round of financing, led by NDS Group, Paid Content reported.
snippet: BlackArrow, a maker of advertising technology designed to target on-demand audiences, has landed $20 million in a third round of financing, led by NDS Group, Paid Content reported.
lead_paragraph: BlackArrow, a maker of advertising technology designed to target on-demand audiences, has landed $20 million in a third round of financing, led by NDS Group, Paid Content reported.
